dc_title_s: Accuratissima totius Asiae tabula: in omnes partes divisa, de nova correcta, ac in lucem edita
dct_alternativeTitle_sm: Accuratissima totius Asiae tabula : in omnes partes divisa\, de nova correcta\, ac in lucem edita
dc_description_s: Scale not given. Map of Asia from Saudi Arabia, Russia, India, China, Japan to Southeast Asia with relief shown pictorially. Title from decorative cartouche surrounded by figures with camel. Plate from: Atlas sive descriptio terrarum orbis cum indicibus alphabeticis ... / Frederik de Wit. Amsterdam : Frederik de Wit, [1688?]. 46.9 x 55.6 cm
b1g_keyword_sm: Asia, Central Maps Early Works to 1800
Southeast Asia Maps Early Works to 1800
South Asia Maps Early Works to 1800
